He operates a goat meat business, buying them for resale to butchers. He faces a challenge of inadequate capital to expand his business. He dreams of establishing a retail shop in the future.

With the KES 30,000 he wants to purchase five goats for meat sale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase five goats for meat sale

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es: Fátima es una emprendedora microempresaria, tiene 36 años, casada, tiene dos años de tener negocio que es una pulpería que está ubicado en su domicilio. Su esposo le ayuda en el negocio el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, productos de bisutería y la compra de una vitrina para acomodar los cosméticos.
texts.en: Fátima is an entrepreneurial small business owner. She is 36 years old and married. She has had her business for two years, a small general store located in her home. Her husband helps her with the business. The loan will be invested in buying materials like rice, beans, sugar, jewelry products and the purchase of display case for cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy materials like rice, beans, sugar, jewelry products and a display case for cosmetics.

loans.name: Estrella Resplandeciente Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socias una de ellas es María es una mujer casada, con tres hijos, tiene 56 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa de cama, y vende ropa nueva y variada ambulante, en su comunidad, vecinos, tanto al crédito como al contado, tiene 15 años de tener su negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como tela para sabana, gruesa de elásticos, conos de hilos y ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisetas de varón, blusas etc. Martha tiene 56 años de edad y su negocio tiene un taller de costura, Teresa tiene 61 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y Marisela vende comida en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Four members make up this group.  María is one of them.  She is married, and she has three children.  She is 56 years old.  Her business is selling bed linens.  She also sells varied new clothing in an itinerant manner to her neighbors in her community.  She sells as much on credit as for cash.  She has had her business for 15 years.

She will use the loan to buy raw material like fabric for sheets, elastic, and cones of thread.  She will also buy clothes like men’s pants, women’s pants, men’s shirts, and blouses, etc.

Martha is 56 years old, and her business is a seamstress shop.  Teresa, age 61, sells cosmetics.  Marisela sells food at her house.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make sheets and to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rica Mae

texts.en: Rica Mae is 21 years old and married with one child. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail business to earn a living. She has been in her business for over two years and earns 1,200 PHP every month. She has joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Now she has requested a loan of 3,500 PHP to purchase additional products to sell. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Dolores requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like sardines, snack foods, sugar and other groceries.

She has been in this business for seven years.

In the future, Dolores would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sardines, snack foods, sugar and other groceries.

loans.name: Airah

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Airah works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending.  Airah is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy paints, spare parts and other materials for her motorcycle transport business.

Airah has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy paints, spare parts and other materials for her business

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is single and has one child. After successfully graduating middle level school, she is now an established businesswoman. She sells eggs in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 12 years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Agnes uses her income to provide for the entire family.

Agnes will use the loan to purchase a greater quantity of eggs, which will aid her by improving her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Agnes plans to diversify the types of products that she sells, thus adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of eggs to resell

loans.name: Deonicia

texts.en: A $1,000 loan is being offered to Deonicia to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as biscuits, noodles, sugar, coffee, slippers and other items. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2008. She feels so comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, noodles, sugar, coffee, slippers and other items

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is married and she works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell.

Marites has been in this business for 16 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Marites aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia is a 53-year-old married mother of six children from Talibon, Bohol. Virginia is a farmer and has been in the farming business for more than 10 years now. Virginia is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. Through this loan, she will be able to improve her farm as well as the harvest. In the future, Virginia hopes to make her farming business successful and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida works hard to support her family. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Nida requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like sugar, soap, detergent, diapers and other groceries.

She has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Nida would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sugar, soap, detergent, diapers and other groceries.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua operates a business selling onions in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). Efua is single and has two children. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Efua uses her income to provide for the entire family. Efua will use the loan to purchase more onions, enabling her to improve her overall sales. As a senior high school graduate, Efua understands the importance of education in improving social conditions. She plans to use the profits from her expanded enterprise to ensure that all her children remain in school.

loans.use: to purchase onions

loans.name: Nida

texts.en: Nida is 47 years old and married with four children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates an agriculture business to earn a living. She has been in her business for over five years and earns 4,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2009 and now she has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Lyka

texts.en:
Lyka is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell school supplies business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more school supplies to sell for her buy and sell school supplies business.

Lyka has been in this business for three years. Lyka earns more income from a food vending business.

Lyka has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more school supplies to sell

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en: Cristina is 35 years old and married with three children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a flowers for sale business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over four years and earns 1,200 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2010. Now she has requested a loan of 4,500 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Rosario works hard to support her family.

To earn a living, she operates a fish-vending business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income by selling dried fish.

Rosario is seeking to borrow a loan in the amount of 19,000 PRP through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall. Notably, Rosario has been sustaining her business activities through 22 prior loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of improving and expanding her business so that she can secure a better future for her family.

loans.use: to expand and improve her business by purchasing additional fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 57 years old and married with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Emma has a fishing business in the Philippines. Emma requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Emma has been in this business for three years. In the future, Emma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Eugenie

texts.en: Eugenie is a 25-year-old woman from Talibon, Bohol. Eugenie runs a sari-sari or variety store selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Eugenie is asking for a loan to buy additional stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap and toiletries. Through this loan, she will be able to attract and cater to more buyers in her store, thus augmenting her sales and income. In the future. Eugenie hopes to make her business successful and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Kamil

texts.en:
Kamil is 31 years old. He is married and has two little children. 

In 2007, he established his clothing business. He began his business because he wanted to take care of his family. His business is located in the outskirts and his main customers are young and old men. He has additional agriculture activities for assistance.

Kamil would like a loan of 1,500 AZN. He requires a loan in order to buy more clothing for resale. He hopes that this loan will support him through proper use. Kamil dreams of giving a qualified education to his children. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more clothing to sell

loans.name: Ma. Nerna

texts.en:
Ma. Nerna is 43 years old and married with one kid. Ma. Nerna works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Nerna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Ma. Nerna has been in this business for 21 years and sells a variety of items such as bread, noodles, soap, sardines and other groceries. 

In the future, Ma. Nerna would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is a youth client from Iraq. He is 22 years old and lives with his family of four members. Haydar, his father and his bother provide the income for the family.

Haydar is a grocer. In his grocery store, Haydar sells various types of good for his customers like snacks, canned food, soft drinks, dairy products and detergents. He established his business in 2010 and gained good experience in this field. Now, Haydar has hired an employee already and is well known in the area thanks to his competitive prices.

Haydar is requesting a youth loan of 2,100 USD to renovate his grocery store. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he will be able to establish his future and take a better care of his parents.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Doña olga de 43 años de edad vive con su mama, su esposo y con su hijo, ella se dedica a vender ropa de forma ambulante en los mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Doña Olga solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar mas mercaderia para surtir su negocio con: faldas, blusas, ropa para niños y niñas, pantalones, etc. y asi obtener mas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna
texts.en:
Olga, 43, lives with her mother, her husband, and her child.

She makes a living selling clothing as a street vendor in the markets near her home.  With the profits from her sales and with the help of her husband they manage to cover their household expenses.

Olga's requesting a loan to be able to buy more merchandise to stock her business with skirts, blouses, clothing for boys and girls, pants, etc.  This way she'll earn more profits and be able to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, shirts, socks, etc.

loans.name: Glenda Yanira

texts.es: Glenda de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles, Glenda es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor desea acrecentar su negocio pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar mas ropa pantalones, camisas, faldas, blusas, ropa para niños y toda clase de cosméticos etc. Glenda asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Glenda is 34 years old and lives with her life partner and her children in her own house. She makes a living selling clothing and cosmetics. She has had the business for several years and this has given her a lot of experience that allows her to make a better income. The business is located in her home. She has obtained a large clientele because people know that it is all quality products at accessible prices. 

Glenda is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work. She fights every day with maximum effort to make a better living. She wants to expand her business but she does not have enough supporting capital. That is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to purchase more clothing like pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, children's clothing and all kinds of cosmetics, etc. Glenda is sure that she will be able to settle the debt and she hopes that it will bring her home financial stability.

loans.use: to buy clothing like blouses, shirts, and socks, as well as cosmetics.

loans.name: Los Jardines Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios uno de ellos es  Luis Antonio tiene 54 años de edad, casado, con tres hijos mayores desde hace 20 años su negocio es la comercialización de perecederos, en el mercado de su localidad, de ser cliente de la institución tiene más de 6 años siendo muy responsable en sus compromisos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra tomate, cebolla, chiltoma, papas, zanahorias, etc. Juana Mercedes tiene 49 años de edad vende frutas frescas ambulantes y Gilma tiene 42 años de edad su negocio es la venta de perecederos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members. One of them is Luis Antonio who is 45 years old, married, and has three adult children. For 20 years he has had a business selling perishable items in his neighborhood market. He has been a client of the institution for more than six years and has been very responsible in his commitments. He will invest the loan in the purchase of tomatoes, onion, sweet peppers, potatoes, carrots, etc.

Juana Mercedes is 49 years old and she sells fresh fruit as a street vendor. Gilma is 42 years old and she has a business selling perishables.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, sweet peppers, onion, potatoes, carrots, etc.

loans.name: 3.05.279.08.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lý works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in future.

Lý is 48 years old and she is married with 2 children.
Lý is the group leader of the 3.05.279.08.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 
Lý supports 2 dependents with her business in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Lý has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Lý hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to buy poultry to raise and sell.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en: Milagros is 45 years old and married with 3 children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. She raises pigs and sells them to earn a living. She has been in this business for over 5 years and earns 4,000PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2007. She has requested a loan of 7,000 to to purchase feed for her pigs. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and also to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed for pigs

loans.name: Rabie

texts.en:
Rabie is an Iraqi youth client. He is 26 years old, married and lives with his family of 5 members. Rabie and his father provide the family's monthly income.
He owns a small shop where he sells clothes for men and children. He established his business in 2006 and has gained good experience in this field. He has hired an employee and has gained a good reputation in his neighborhood. He is requesting a youth loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to renovate his shop, install new shelves and to install signage. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he can provide his family with better living standards.

loans.use: to renovate his shop, install new shelves and to install signage

loans.name: Ma. Jenny

texts.en:
Ma. Jenny is 42 years old and married with five children.

Ma. Jenny works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 19000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell like bread, sugar, cooking oil, noodles, laundry soap, etc. in her general store.

Ma. Jenny has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns additional income from hog raising.

Ma. Jenny aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like bread, sugar, cooking oil, noodles, laundry soap, etc. in her general store

loans.name: Halimatu

texts.en: After graduating Junior High School, Halimatu decided to set up her own general store and earrings business in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast) in Ghana. With over 5 years of experience, she is currently looking to expand her enterprise further. Unfortunately, she is limited due to a lack of funds. As a result, this loan will be used to help her by purchase more provisions and earrings to resell. She aims to use the profits from her business to help support her husband (who is a Driver).

loans.use: to help her by purchase more provisions and earrings for resale.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, dos quais 1 frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É segurança num hospital e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, janelas, portas, barrotes, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e mobilar para dar mais conforto a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de crescer profissionalmente para ganhar mais e obter créditos suficientes para realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Alberto is married and has two children, one of whom attends school. He lives in a house that he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He works in a hospital as a security guard. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, window frames, doors, beams, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
His wish for the future is to finish building and furnishing his house, so that his family will be more comfortable. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is growing professionally in order to earn more. Another challenge is obtaining enough loans to accomplish his projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, window frames, doors, beams, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is single gentleman, aged 24 years old. He has been employed in the motorcycle business for the last two years, making a monthly income of KES 12,000. He learnt about KADET LTD from other motorbike riders, registered members who have been assisted financially by KADET LTD. 

Moses has acquired his first asset loan of KES 75,000, which will assist him in acquiring his own motorcycle. He will use the proceeds to meet his basic needs.

He hopes to be able to save up enough to purchase another motorcycle. His dream is to attain financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase his own motorcycle.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is 37 years old and married with seven children. Four of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Violeta has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like curtains, pants, blouses and other ready-to-wear clothing.

In the future, Violeta would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like curtains, pants, blouses and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: San Juan Masias Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Priscila es miembro de  la alcancía “San Juan Masía”
La Sra. Priscila de 55 años es viuda, tiene 05 hijos quienes en  la actualidad todos son mayores de edad. La Sra. Priscila siempre ha trabajado muy duro con el fin de brindarle  a sus  hijos lo necesario para vivir dignamente y apoyarlos con sus estudios. Ella trabaja preparando y vendiendo diversos alimentos, antes alquilaba un lugar en un mercado de su zona, pero no vendía mucho por eso decidió salir a las calles para ofrecer sus productos, allí encontró muchos clientes que en su mayoría son trabajadores de la zona, diariamente trabaja cerca de 8 horas recorriendo diversas calles de la ciudad, el dinero de su préstamo es muy importante para ella porque así puede comprar los ingredientes para preparar sus comidas, por otro lado también se dedica a la costura y más adelante desea tener un taller y dejar el negocio de comidas porque es muy sacrificado.
La Sra. Priscila quiere agradecer por su préstamo a quienes lo hacen posible, tanto a EDAPROSPO  como  los inversores de KIVA quienes ayudan a su grupo comunal.

Priscila esta sentada, viste blusa celeste sin mangas.
texts.en:
Priscila is a member of the 'San Juan Masía' community bank.  She is 55 years old, widowed, and has five children who are all now adults.  Priscila has always worked very hard to provide her children with everything they need to live a decent life and has supported them in their studies.  Her business is preparing and selling food.  In the past, she rented a spot in her local market but she didn't sell much.  For this reason, she decided to go out into the streets to sell her products.  There she found a lot of customers who were mainly local workers.

Priscila works around 8 hours a day, traveling through different streets in the city.  The money from this loan is very important to her because it will enable her to buy the ingredients she needs to prepare her food.  In addition to her food business, Priscila also sews.  In the future, she would like to have a sewing workshop and give up the food business as it is very demanding.

Priscila would like to thank those who will make her loan possible: both EDAPROSPO and Kiva lenders.  She thanks them for helping her community bank.

In the photo, Priscila is the lady who is sitting down and wearing a sky-blue, sleeveless blouse.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business

loans.name: Jose Isamir

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 28 años, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, junto con el vive   sus hijos y su esposa quien le apoya en su actividad comercial. su negocio es pulpería,  trabajo que realiza desde hace 4 años en su comunidad donde vive. 
Don José su negocio se encuentra en punto muy estratégico, porque esta por la calle panamericana y esto hace que sea muy visitado, tiene clientes con los cuales trabaja desde hace mucho tiempo brindándoles su producto. 
Don José el crédito lo necesita para la compra de maíz, frijoles, embutidos, carne de pollo, res, refrescos, arroz, azúcar etc. El impacto esperado con el crédito, es que su negocio crezca, ya que comprara  mucha más producto.
Don José espera satisfacer las necesidades de cada uno de sus clientes los cuales los cuales le visitan a diario por la calidad de sus productos tiene mucha demanda.
Don Jose sus planes a futuro es seguir creciendo en su negocio propio y generarse mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto para el y su familia.



Choluteca, Honduras - Abril del 2013.
texts.en:
José is 28 years old and lives in the southern area of Honduras. He lives with his children and his wife, who helps him in his business. He has a small general store, work that he has been doing for four years in the community where he lives. José's business is located at a very strategic location because it is on the Pan-American highway and this makes it much visited. He has customers that he has been serving for a long time, providing them his products. 

José needs the loan for the purchase of corn, beans, cold cuts, chicken, beef, soft drinks, rice, sugar, etc. The expected impact of the loan is that his business will grow, as he will buy many more products. José hopes to satisfy the needs of each one of his customers, who visit him daily. Due to the quality of his products he has a great deal of demand. 

José's plans for the future are to continue growing his business and generating better income so that he can have a better quality of life, both for himself and his family.


Choluteca, Honduras - April 2013.

loans.use: To buy corn, beans, cold cuts, chicken, beef, soft drinks, rice, sugar, etc. for his store.

loans.name: Judith Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Judith de 47 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella tiene un negocio de venta de pollos en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene varios años de tenerlo, tiene mucha clientela pues vende los pollos a un precio accesible y muy frescos, es una mujer muy trabajadora, amable y responsable con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Doña Judith solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar mas pollos al mayor para poder tener siembre lo que sus clientes quieren y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Judith is 47 years old. She lives with her life's companion and their two children. She has a business selling chickens in the market close to her house. She has had it for several years. She has a a lot of customers because she sells very fresh chickens at an accessible price. She is a hardworking, friendly and responsible woman. With the profits she makes, she is able to pay for her household expenses. Judith is asking for a loan that will allow her to be bale to buy more chickens wholesale so she can always have what her customers want and thus make more profits to make more profits to give her family more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy chickens wholesale.

loans.name: 04-03-10-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Ms. Đỡ has a retail business selling dried vegetables and bread. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables and bread to resell. Đỡ has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Đỡ is 63 years old and single, with three children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents, as her children are grown up.

This is Đỡ’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Đỡ is the group leader of the 04-03-10-Nam Ngạn Solidarity Group, which consists of four members. 

With her business profit, Đỡ hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and bread to resell.

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos, todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É motorista e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, areia, pedra, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua ferragem. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua ferragem e começar a trabalhar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é investir mais na ferragem para auxiliar nas despesas e nos projectos futuros.
texts.en:
Armando is married and has four children, all of whom are adults. He lives in a house that he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a driver. With the current loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building his hardware store.
His wish for the future is to finish building his hardware store and to start working. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is investing more in his hardware store so that he can afford his expenses and his future projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, sand, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building his hardware store.

loans.name: Fuente Artesanal Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores una de ellas es Fanny tiene 28 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras. Tiene cuatro años de tener su negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de frutas como mangos 100 unidades, naranjas 100 unidades, banano, piña, tomate, aguacate, sandia etc. María tiene 41 años de edad y su negocio es la de un taller de carpintería en su domicilio, Patricia tiene 21 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas y cosméticos y Bladimir tiene 33 años y su negocio es la venta de tortillas.
texts.en: This group is made up of four enterprising members. One of them is Fanny. She is 28 years old, in a common law marriage and has a son. Her business is selling fruits and vegetables. She has had her business for four years. She will invest her loan in buying fruit such as 100 units of mangos, 100 units of oranges, bananas, pineapples, avocados, watermelons, etc. María is 41 years old and her business is a carpentry shop in her home. Patricia is 21 and her business is selling fruit and cosmetics, and Bladimir is 33 and his business is selling tortillas.

loans.use: to invest in buying fresh fruit such as 100 units of mangos, 100 units of of oranges, 100 units of bananas, pineapples, tomatoes, avocado, watermelon, etc.

loans.name: Tengo Fe Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cinco socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Meyling tiene 28 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de verduras, frutas en el mercado de Masaya, tiene dos años de dedicarse al negocio. El crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de frutas como papaya, banano, sapote, pitahaya, pipianes, naranjas, mandarina etc. Reyna tiene 24 años de edad y su negocio es venta de frutas y verduras, María tiene 48 años de edad y su negocio es de un taller de artesanía, Petrona socia de 45 años su negocio es venta de frutas y verduras ambulante y Jeaneth tiene 39 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas.
texts.en: This group is made up of five enterprising, successful members. One of them is Meyling. She is 28 and her business is selling fruit and vegetables in the Masaya market. She will invest the loan in buying fruit such as papayas, bananas, sapotes, pitahayas, pipianes, oranges, tangerines, etc. Reyna is 24 years old and her business is selling fruit and vegetables. María is 48 and her business is an artisanal crafts workshop. Petrona is 45 and her business is selling fruits and vegetables and Jeaneth is 39 and her business is selling fruit.

loans.use: to invest in buying fruit such as papayas, bananas, sapotes, pipianes, oranges, tangerines, etc.

loans.name: Las Marias Group

texts.es:
Grupo formado por cuatro socias una de ellas es Flor mujer soltera de 23 años de edad, trabajadora desde hace 10 años tiene su negocio en la elaboración de chicha de maíz empacada comercializa su producto en el mercado de Masaya. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como maíz, leñas, rodaminas, bolsas plásticas, canela, vainilla, frambuesa etc. Silvia tiene 51 años y su negocio
es la venta de frutas y verduras, Ana tiene 56 años su negocio es la venta de verduras y perecederos y María tiene 39 años y su negocio es la venta de pinol, pinolillo.
texts.en: This group is made up of four members. One of them is Flor. She is a single, 23 year old, hardworking woman. For 10 years, she has had a business making packaged chicha de maíz. She sells her product in the Masaya market. She will invest the loan in buying raw materials such as corn, firewood, rhodamines, plastic bags, vanilla, raspberries, etc. Silvia is 51 years old and her business is selling fruits and vegetables. Ana is 56 and and her business is selling vegetables and perishables. María is 39 years old and her business is selling pinol and pinolillo.

loans.use: to invest in buying raw materials such as corn, firewood, rhodamines, plastic bags, cinnamon,  vanilla, raspberries, etc.

loans.name: Ruth Walkiria

texts.es: Ruth es una microempresaria joven , casada, con dos hijos menores y desde 10 años se dedica a la venta de pollo, por ser un buen cliente se promociona de metodología grupal a metodología individual, el crédito lo invertirá en  la compra de pollo enteros, pollo en piezas, muslos, piernas, pechuga, alitas estos productos los comercializa en su domicilio.
texts.en: Ruth is a young microentrepreneur who is married and has two minor children. She has been working in chicken sales for 10 years and is now requesting a loan to buy whole chickens as well as chicken parts, such as thighs, legs, breasts and wings. She sells these products at her home.

loans.use: to buy whole chickens as well as chicken parts, such as thighs, legs, breasts, wings, etc.

loans.name: Gabino Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Gabino, hoy en día ya es casado, su esposa es ama de casa y se encarga del cuido de su hijo, ellos dependen económicamente de él ya que solo él trabaja. Continua laborando para la Alcaldía como ayudante de albañil, solicita este crédito para la construcción de un anexo en su vivienda ya que ésta es muy pequeña y necesita más espacio porque la familia está creciendo y así podrá brindarles mayor comodidad.
texts.en:
Mr. Gabino is currently married and his wife takes care of the house and their son. He is the only one working, so the family depends on him financially. He still works for the Mayor's Office as a builder assistant. 

He is requesting this loan to build an annex in his house. It is now too small and they are in need of a bigger space for the growing family. This way he will be able to provide them with higher comfort.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, bricks and stones.

loans.name: Amalia Del Carmen

texts.es: Amalia es una empresaria de éxitos tiene 29 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es una panadería ubicado en su domicilio, tiene 8 años de tener su negocio ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a vender frutas frescas ambulante, poco a poco de sus pequeñas ganancias fue invirtiendo en materia prima para hacer pan, desde ese entonces el negocio ha venido creciendo hasta hoy logrando tener siete trabajadores ya que es generadora de empleos también. Tiene 6 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como harina, manteca, azúcar, rodamina, levadura, etc.
texts.en:
Amalia is a 29-year old successful entrepreneur. She lives with her partner and has run her own bakery business at home for 8 years. She previously worked as a mobile seller of fresh fruit, but started to invest her small earnings in supplies to make bread. Her business has been growing ever since and now has seven workers and is generating employment. 

She has been with the credit institution for 6 years and will use the loan to buy supplies such as flour, butter, sugar, coloring, yeast, etc.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as flour, butter, sugar, coloring, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install the electrical wiring at his house.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is an Iraqi youth client, who is 30 years old and married. Haydar lives with his family of eight, three of whom assist each other in providing the family income. 

Haydar owns a small garage where he specializes in tinting cars. He has been in this field for 10 years and gained his experience by working as an employee at a similar garage. In 2009, Haydar established his own business and has now hired an employee. He has become well-known in his neighborhood thanks to his affordable prices.

Haydar is requesting a youth loan of 3,000 USD, which he will use to buy specialized equipment for his work. Haydar believes that this loan will improve his business and increase his profits and will give him the ability to provide his family with a better financial situation.

loans.use: to buy specialized equipment for his work.

loans.name: Andrés

texts.es:
Andrés de 28 años de edad, es un joven emprendedor, que al lado de su esposa lucha por consolidar su negocio. Actualmente presta en su residencia el servicio de videojuegos. Actividad que es su única fuente de ingresos para el pago del arriendo, la alimentación y el sostenimiento de su hijo de un año de edad. 
Su mayor deseo es salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de la familia, motivo que los ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito que invertirán en la compra de un play y mecatos para ofrecer mayor variedad. 
Espera que con dicha inversión la calidad de vida mejore y poder gozar con su familia de una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Andrés is a young entrepreneur of 28 years. He fights standing alongside his wife to strengthen his business. He has a business based out of his home charging people to play videogames. This business is the sole source of income that pays for the rent, food, and supporting his one year old son. 

His biggest wish is to get ahead in life and improve the quality of life for his family. This has motivated him to request a loan to invest in a play station and pastries to offer a greater variety. 

He hopes that with said investment, their quality of life will improve, and he will be able to enjoy stable finances with his family.

loans.use: purchase a play station and pastries

loans.name: Dusabe Group

texts.fr:
Scholastique  fait partie du groupe Dusabe  et  habite à Gitega. Elle  a 50 ans et est mariée à Ndayi, un maçon. Ensemble ils ont  8 enfants, âgés de 8 à 30 ans,dont 5  étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de chèvre depuis  14 ans. 

Elle est à son quatorzième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  quelques chèvres de plus; toutes les chèvres seront  revendues afin de  gagner plus. 

Avec le gain de son commerce, elle est parvenue à acheter une vache.
texts.en:
Scholastique is a member of the Dusabe group, and she lives in Gitega.  She is 50 years old and married to Ndayi, a mason.  They have eight children together, aged 8 through 30.  Five of their children are in school.

Scholastic has been selling goats for 14 years.  This is her 14th loan with Turame.  With the loan that she is receiving from KIVA, she will increase her capital and buy a few additional goats which will all be resold.  Her goal is to make more money.

With the earnings from her business, Scholastique has managed to buy a cow.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy additional goats which will be resold, in order to make more money.

loans.name: Maria Andrea

texts.es: La señora Andrea, de 52 años de edad, es soltera trabaja para una institución estatal en salud desde hace mas de 20 años, solicita este crédito para realizar el pago del curso de titulación de la carrera de licenciatura en farmacia, siendo adulta decidió continuar con sus estudios porque desea lograr su sueño de ser una profesional lo cual lo podrá lograr solamente con la ayuda de financiamiento, primeramente Dios y el apoyo de Kiva atravez Afodenic, ya que sus ingresos son muy bajos y no le permite realizar estos gastos de un solo pago.
texts.en:
Andrea is 52 and single. She has been working in a state institution in the health field for more than 20 years. She is applying for this loan in order to pay for her final course for her bachelor's degree in pharmacy. 

As an adult she decided to continue with her education because she wishes to achieve her dream of being a professional. But she will be able to achieve this only with the help, first and foremost of God, and of a Kiva loan through Afodenic. This is because her income is very low and does not allow her to make these expenditures in only one payment.

loans.use: To pay for her final degree course.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Enagnon  1 Group

texts.fr: ENAGNON 1 est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Louise est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Louise est âgée 33 ans et est mariée à un certain Antonin. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Louise vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la maison. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Louise vend des condiments, du riz et du haricot depuis quinze ans. Louise s'approvisionne  dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Louise s’associe avec les autres membres du groupe ENAGNON 1 pour consentir un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
ENAGNON 1 is a group which consists of three women who live in the same neighborhood.  The group's representative, named Louise, is the one raising her hand in the photo.  Louise is 33 years old and married to a man called Antonin.  They have three children, all in school and their dependents.  Louise lives with her husband and children and shares the household's expenses with her husband.

In order to meet her needs, Louise has been selling condiments, rice and beans for the past fifteen years.  She stocks up at a market located in Benin.

Eager to boost her business and to meet her customers' demand, she is requesting a fourth loan from ALIDé, in association with the other members of the ENAGNON 1 group.  Previous loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and condiments.

loans.name: Main Dans La Main Group

texts.fr: MAIN DANS LA MAIN est un groupe composé de quatre personnes qui vivent dans un même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Chantal (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 39 ans. Chantal est mariée à un certain Seyni. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Chantal vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la maison. Chantal a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges et celles de sa famille, Chantal vend des tissus et des chaussures depuis une quinzaine d’années par la méthode de distribution. Chantal s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses et de se faire plus de profit, Chantal sollicite, ensemble avec les autres  membres du groupe MAIN DANS LA MAIN, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
MAIN DANS LA MAIN is a group composed of four women who live in the same neighborhood.  The group's representative, named Chantal, is raising her hand in the photo.  She is 39 years old and married to a man called Seyni.  Chantal and Seyni have two children, both in school and their dependents.  Chantal lives with her husband and children.  The couple jointly takes care of the household's expenses. 

Chantal left school at the primary level.  In order to cover her various expenses, as well as those of her family, she has been selling fabrics and shoes for about fifteen years, through the distribution system.  She stocks up at a market located in Benin.

In order to better meet the expectations of an increasing number of customers, and also to make more profits, Chantal is requesting a third loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of the MAIN DANS LA MAIN group.  Previous loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and shoes.

loans.name: Ingrid Yaneth

texts.es: Ingrid de 38 años, es madre de dos hijos de 12 y 18 años de edad, desde hace 5 años decidió montar un negocio en su casa con el fin de generar ingresos que le permitieran sostener su hogar y brindarles educación a sus hijos. Desea poder posicionar su salón de belleza en el sector con el fin incrementar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos que le permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Su mayor sueño es ver formados a sus hijos y verlos convertidos en grandes profesionales. Motivos que la han impulsado a solicitar un crédito con el que espera financiar la compra de productos de belleza con el fin de ampliar su portafolio y convertir su negocio en el número uno del sector.
texts.en:
Ingrid, 38 years old, is the mother of two children, who are 12 and 18 years of age. Five years ago she decided to open a business in her home in order to generate an income that would enable her to support her household and provide an education for her children.

She wants to be able to position her beauty salon in the area so as to increase her sales and generate more earnings, which will enable her to have a better quality of life. Her greatest dream is to see her children educated and to see them become fine professionals. This goal has inspired her to request a loan so that she can purchase beauty products and thereby expand her services and convert her business into the number one beauty salon in the area.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ice cream and supplies to make and sell it.

loans.name: María Del Socorro

texts.es:
María  de 40 años de edad, cuenta que debido a la difícil condición económica por la que atravesó su familia, surgió la idea de elaborar pulpas de frutas y comercializarla entre los vecinos del sector. Asegura que el producto se ha vuelto tan popular que personas de otros barrios se han acercado para solicitarle encargos. Razón que la ha impulsado ha solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una motocicleta con el fin de distribuir sus pedidos de una forma rápida y eficiente, ahorrando costos de transporte.
Su mayor anhelo es brindarles a sus dos hijos la oportunidad de ingresar  a la universidad, ya que considera que éste es el mejor regalo que puede dejarles.
texts.en:
María, 40 years old, says that due to the difficult economic situation that her family experienced, she had the idea of preparing fruit pulp and selling it to her neighbors in the area. She claims that the product has become so popular that people from other neighborhoods have come to her to place orders. 

The reason she has been inspired to request a loan is to purchase a motorcycle so that she can deliver her orders more quickly and efficiently and also save transportation costs..

Her greatest desire is to insure that her two children have the opportunity to enroll in the university because she feels that this is the best gift she can leave them.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Veronica is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling onions, beans and groundnuts in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 15 years. Veronica is married and has five children. Her husband works as a welder. 

The proceeds from her business normally go toward helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Veronica wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of onions, beans and groundnuts. In the long term, Veronica plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the rising customer demand.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels of onion, beans and groundnuts.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is 38 years old and has five children. Olivia is married and has three children who are in school.

Olivia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Olivia requested a 11,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

Olivia has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Olivia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nelida

texts.en:
Nelida is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a tailoring business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and rice retailing. Nelida is borrowing PHP 21000 through NWTF to buy tools and equipment for her tailoring business.

Nelida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Claudia Elena

texts.es:
Claudia de 37 años de edad, se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer emprendedora y con ganas de mejorar su futuro y el bienestar de sus hijos. 
Actialmente se dedica a la venta de productos herbalife, actividad que le permite contribuir con los gastos familiares y suministrarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía con el fin de aumentar sus ventas, debido a la acogida que ha tenido su producto en el sector.
Su mayor sueño es generar los recursos suficientes para la adquisición de una vivienda.
texts.en:
Claudia is a 37 year old female entrepreneur who is driven to improve her future and the wellbeing of her children. She sells herbalife products, an activity that allows her to contribute to the household expenses and provide a quality education to her children. 

Today she is requesting a loan to invest in merchandise to increase her sales, due do the good reception her products have had in the area. 

Her biggest dream is to have enough resources to purchase a home.

loans.use: purchase Herbalife products

loans.name: Mónica Yuleima

texts.es:
Mónica de 29 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de tamales desde su vivienda, con el fin de contribuir con los gastos del hogar, debido a que el dinero que gana su cónyuge no es suficiente. 
Mónica es una mujer llena de sueños, uno de ellos es montar su propio negocio de comidas rápidas, pero considera que este será un proyecto a mediano plazo. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que comprará insumos para la preparación de tamales ya que por su calidad y buen servicio le han solicitado varios encargos. Espera mejorar la condición económica de su familia y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mónica is 29 and sells tamales out of her home in order to contribute to the household expenses, since the money that her husband earns is not enough. Mónica is a woman full of dreams, one of which is to set up her own business for fast meals, but she considers this to be a project for the near future. 

She is currently requesting a loan to purchase ingredients for making tamales, since the high quality and good service have led to many orders. She hopes to improve the finances of her family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: purchase ingredients necessary for making tamales

loans.name: Robinson

texts.es:
Robinsón de 37 años de edad, se dedica al oficio de la ebanistería desde hace más de 15 años. Aprendió la actividad gracias a su padre quien laboró toda su vida en este sector. 
Con el fin de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de materia prima como madera, espuma a fin de elaborar la producción que le han solicitado y que no ha podido realizar por falta de capital.
Su mayor sueño es brindarle a su familia una vivienda digna, por lo cual desea ahorrar  y dar la cuota inicial para su adquisición.
texts.en:
Robinsón is a 37 year old cabinetmaker who has been in this trade for over 15 years. He learned thanks to his father, who worked as a cabinetmaker all his life. 

In order to improve the quality of life of his family, he is requesting a loan to invest in raw materials such as wood and foam so he can fill some orders that he had not been able to do because of a lack of capital. 

His biggest dream is to provide his family a decent home, so he wants to save money and make the down payment on a home.

loans.use: purchase raw materials such as wood and foam

loans.name: Germán Antonio

texts.es:
Germán de 39 años de edad, es un campesino dedicado a la agricultura. Ama el campo da gracias a Dios por las bendiciones que ha recibido. Desde los 20 años labora en una finca como mayordomo, su patrón le ha permitido realizar algunos sembrados de tomate, lo que le permite sostener a su familia y velar por la educación de sus dos hijos menores de edad. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de  semillas y abonos para el cultivo de tomates. 
Sueña con mejorar la condición económica y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Germán, 39, is a farmer dedicated to agriculture.  He loves working on the farm and is thankful to God for the blessings he has received.   For 20 years he has worked on a farm as its administrator and the owner of the land has allowed him to grow enough tomatoes to support his family and make sure his children get a good education.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for his tomato crop.  His goal is to improve his economic situation and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers for his tomato crop.

loans.name: Denis Yaneth

texts.es:
Denis de 42 años de edad, se dedica al oficio de la confección, como medio de subsistencia. Debido a la difícil condición económica de su familia, Denis no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, por lo cual inició a laborar desde su juventud en este oficio. 
Desde hace algunos años decidió montar su taller y trabajar como independiente. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de telas para la confección de los pedidos solicitados.
Su mayor deseo es expandir su negocio y convertirse en una fuente de empleo para su localidad.
texts.en:
Denis, 42, earns a living working as a seamstress.  Because of the difficult economic situation of her family, she was unable to get an education and started working in this field when she was young.

Some years ago Denis decided to set up her own sewing shop and work independently.  Now she is requesting a loan to buy fabric so she can fill the orders she has received.

Her greatest desire is to expand her business and be able to offer employment to people in her town.

loans.use: To buy fabric.

loans.name: Erik Yesid

texts.es:
Erik se ha dedicado a la venta comida, como actividad económica para generar el sustento de su familia. Laboró por más de cuatro meses en una pizzería y posteriormente decidió independizarse y montar una cafetería. En la actualidad su negocio se encuentra en tapa de introducción y crecimiento, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de publicidad, mesas, sillas y pintura con el objeto de mejorar la calidad en el servicio y posicionar su negocio dentro del sector.
Sueña poder garantizarle a su familia una calidad de vida digna.
texts.en:
Erik runs a food business to generate income to support his family.  For over four years he worked at a pizza shop and then decided to become independent, setting up his own cafe.  Currently his is in the expansion phase and therefore requesting a loan to buy publicity, tables, chairs and paint in an effort to improve the quality of his service and position his business in the sector.

His goal is to guarantee a decent quality of life for his family.

loans.use: To buy publicity, tables, chairs and paint.

loans.name: Gloria Estella

texts.es:
Gloria Estella es una mujer a la que le ha tocado luchar para salir adelante, sin ningún apoyo económico y grandes responsabilidades, Gloria lucha en búsqueda de un mejor futuro y mejores condiciones de vida.  Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogo y gracias a esta actividad genera los recursos para su manutención.
Hoy se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que destinará en la compra de productos de belleza y aseo personal al por mayor con el fin de generar ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria Estella is a woman who has had to struggle to get ahead without any economic support and with great responsibilities.  She strives to have a better future and improve her living conditions.  For ten years she has been selling products by catalogue in order to generate enough income for her support.

Now she is requesting a loan to buy wholesale beauty and personal hygiene products in an effort to generate more income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale beauty and personal hygiene products.

loans.name: Javier Alberto

texts.es:
Javier Alberto de 44 años de edad, es un hombre emprendedor y con grandes sueños. Después de realizar una capacitación en mantenimiento de computadores, optó por crear su propio negocio dedicado a prestar el servicio de internet, venta de minutos de celular y fotocopias. Hoy lleva ocho años realizando la actividad y agradece por la gran oportunidad que tuvo de convertirse en microempresario. Asegura que su familia es lo más importante y la razón para luchar cada día en búsqueda de mejores oportunidades.
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la adquisición de  equipos de computo, con el fin de ampliar su negocio y  mejorar la calidad en el servicio.
texts.en:
Javier Alberto, 44, is an entrepreneur with grand dreams.  After receiving training in computer maintenance he decided to create his own business offering Internet services, cell phone cards and photocopies.  He has been in business for eight years and is thankful for the great opportunity he had to become a small business owner.  Because his family is top priority for him, he works hard every day to seek out the best opportunities.

He is requesting a loan to buy computer equipment to expand his business and improve the quality of his services.

loans.use: To buy computer equipment.

loans.name: Karrar

texts.en:
Karrar is a 22-years-old Iraqi youth client, who lives with his five-member family. Karrar, his father and his two brothers together provide the family income. 

Karrar owns a small shop where he sells tools and supplies. He established his business in 2012, and has gained good experience in this field. Karrar is becoming well-known in the surrounding area, thanks to his shop’s strategic location in the market. 

Karrar is requesting a youth loan of $1,800 to renovate his shop and to install signage. Karrar is hoping that this loan will improve his business and will result in an increase of his total revenues. From the increase of his profits, Karrar will be able to provide his family better living standards.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and to install signage.

loans.name: Tout Est Grace Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TOUT EST GRACE est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La  représentante du groupe, du nom de Sylviane Laurencia est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sylviane Laurencia est âgée de 44 ans. Sylviane Laurencia est mariée à un certain Achille. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et ceux de ses enfants, Sylviane Laurencia exerce comme activité la vente d'huile végétale depuis vingt ans par la méthode de distribution. Sylviane Laurencia s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Sylviane Laurencia sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe TOUT EST GRACE, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
TOUT EST GRACE Group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. For the second time, the members of this group are seeking financial support from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, in order to bolster their businesses.

The group's representative is named Sylviane Laurencia. She's the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 44 years old and married to one Achille. Together, they have three school-attending children whom they have to support.

To provide for herself and her children, Sylviane Laurencia has been selling vegetable oil through the distribution system for twenty years. She gets her supplies in a market in Benin.

Eager to satisfy her clientele and in order to increase her revenue and profit, Sylviane Laurencia, together with the other members of her group, is seeking a second loan from ALIDé. The first one was repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy vegetable oil

loans.name: Vivogbe Group

texts.fr: Le groupe VIVOGBE est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Félicienne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Félicienne est âgée de 49 ans et vit au Bénin. Félicienne n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Félicienne est mariée à un certain Frédéric. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés, dont un reste encore à leur charge. Les charges du ménage sont assumées par Félicienne et son mari. Afin de répondre à ses besoins, Félicienne vend du pain et des articles de grandes consommations depuis huit ans. Félicienne s’approvisionne dans un un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Félicienne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe VIVOGBE, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
VIVOGBE Group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The group's representative is named Félicienne. She's the one raising her hand in the photograph. She never attended school.

Félicienne is 49 years old and lives in Benin. She's married to one Frédéric. Together, they have five school-attending children, and one of them is still in their care. The couple ensures together that the household expenses get covered.

In order to provide for herself, Félicienne has been selling bread and food staples for eight years. She gets her supplies in a market in Benin.

Eager to satisfy her clientele and in order to increase her revenue and profit, Félicienne, together with the other members of her group, is seeking a first loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy bread and food stapes (beans, etc)

loans.name: Adja-Ya Group

texts.fr: ADJA-YA est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres appartiennent à un groupe de tontine. La représentante du groupe, nommée Rachidath est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Rachidath est âgée 32 ans et est mariée à un certain Adiou. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Rachidath vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Rachidath se fait aider par son mari dans les charges de la famille. Pour faire face à ses charges, Rachidath exerce comme activité la vente des produits pharmaceutiques et d'autres produits tels que les boissons en cannettes depuis dix ans. Rachidath s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Rachidath s’associe avec les autres membres du groupe ADJA-YA pour consentir un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le prêt antérieur a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
ADJA-YA Group is made up of three members, who belong to a "tontine" group. The group's representative is named Rachidath. She's the one raising her hand in the photograph.

Rachidath, age 32, is married to one Adiou. They have three school-attending children to support. Rachidath lives together with her husband and her children. She gets help form her husband to cover the family's expenses.

To cover her expenses, Rachidath has been selling pharmaceutical products and other items, such as canned beverages, for ten years. She gets her supplies in a market in Benin.

In order to bolster her business and meet customer demand, Rachidath, together with the other members of her group, is seeking a second loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé. The first loan was repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy canned beverages

loans.name: Wangninan Group

texts.fr: WANGNINAN est un groupe de trois personnes qui sont des belles sœurs. La représentante du groupe, nommée Christine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Christine est âgée de 35 ans. Christine est mariée à un certain Mahuton. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Christine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charge de la maison. Christine n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Christine vend des condiments et des produits divers à son domicile depuis vingt ans. Christine s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Christine s’associe avec les autres membres du groupe WANGNINAN pour consentir un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
WANGNINAN Group is made up of three people who are sisters-in-law. The group's representative, named Christine, is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 35 years old and married to one Mahuton. Together, they have four school-attending children in their care.

Christine lives together with her husband and children. The couple takes care of the household expenses together. Christine never attended school. For twenty years, she's been selling condiments and various products at her home. She gets her supplies in a market in Benin.

In order to bolster her business and meet customer demand, Christine, together with the other members of her group, is seeking a first loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy condiments and other products

loans.name: Esi

texts.en:
Esi is a small-scale food vendor selling cooked rice, fried fish and cooked eggs in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). She has had some form of formal education as she is a Junior High-School graduate. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a poultry farmer. 

Esi has been working as a food vendor selling cooked rice, fried fish and cooked eggs for close to 12 years. Her income is used to help her husband pay the utility bills and their children’s school fees. 

She plans to use her loan to purchase an increased quantity of rice, fish and eggs, thus allowing her to meet rising customer demand. She hopes to use the profits from her enterprise to fulfill her dream of buying rice, fish and eggs, hence helping her sell from a fixed location in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of rice, fish and eggs, thus allowing her to meet rising customer demand.

loans.name: Setei

texts.en:
Setei is 43 years old, married and the mother of seven children. For the last 11 years, she has farmed her own piece of land and earns a good income. Wheat has proved to be doing well in her area due to good climatic conditions. 

She learned about KADET Ltd. through posters. This will be her third loan. She plans to buy farm inputs and hire machinery for preparation of the land.  With the profits she hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, she plans to re-invest in the farm and plant more acres of wheat.

Her future dreams are that she will be able to buy a bigger piece of land, plant more wheat for commercial farming, buy her own farm machinery, and educate her children. She is a hard-working woman who is focused on her set goals.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and hire machinery for preparation of the land.

loans.name: Gaudencia

texts.en:
Gaudencia is a 59-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Getafe, Bohol. Gaudencia has been engaged in a fishing business for more than 10 years now together with her husband. 

Gaudencia is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets and to pay for the repair of the fishing boat. Through this, her husband will be able to improve his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. In the future, Gaudencia hopes to expand their fishing business in order to generate more revenue. She also wants to save money for the repayment of her loan.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and to pay for the repair of the fishing boat.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 29-year-old single businessman. He supports his brother and sister. He has been selling music item for a period of about five years with an income of approximately KES 18,500 a month. 

He is taking the third loan from KADET Ltd. after successfully repaying the previous one. He wants to use it to buy a stock of CDs, DVs and other music items. He hopes to buy a plot of land and build his home.

loans.use: to buy a stock of CDs, DVs and other music items.

loans.name: Luisa María

texts.es:
Luisa de 46 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y valiente, a pesar de las dificultades que ha atravesado por su carencia de recursos, está convencida que el mañana será mucho mejor.
Se dedica a la cría y venta de porcinos como fuente de ingresos para su hogar. Tiene tres hijos por los cuales vela para garantizarles una calidad de vida digna.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de cuido de levante, engorde y adecuaciones de corrales, ya que se encuentran en mal estado.
Su mayor deseo es mejorar su condición económica  y poder adquirir una vivienda para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luisa, 46, is an enterprising and brave woman that, despite the difficulties she has faced and the lack of resources, is convinced that the future will be much better.

Luisa raises and sells pigs as a way to generate income for her family. She has three children and she strives to give them a dignified life. She is requesting a loan to buy feed to fatten the pigs, and to improve the pens, which are in bad shape.

Her biggest wish is to improve her economic conditions and be able to acquire a house to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and improve the pigpens.

loans.name: Agusta

texts.en:
Agusta is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from shell-crafting.  Agusta is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store business.

Agusta has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy is 40 years old and is from Nakuru. She has seven children who are in school.

She is a farmer and has applied for her first loan from KADET Ltd. to enable her buy spraying chemicals for her tomatoes. She was introduced to KADET Ltd. by a fellow client.

She hopes to practice large scale farming in the near future.

loans.use: To buy spraying chemicals.

loans.name: 04-03-07-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Năng has a retail business selling dry food. Năng is 51 years old and she is married with four children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents as her children are grown-up.

She is requesting a loan to purchase candies and biscuits to resell.  Năng has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Năng faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Năng is the group leader of the 04-03-07-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of four members. This is Năng first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. With her business profit, Năng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase candies and biscuits to resell.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a farmer from Ndunyu Njeru. He benefited from the previous loan by being able to harvest farm inputs on time and used the profits to pay school fees for his children.

He has applied for his fifth loan from KADET Ltd. to enable him buy fertilizer and seeds after paying back his previous loan successfully.

He hopes to expand his farming and improve his family's status in the near future.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 48 years old and is married with two children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a business producing copra (dried coconut meat) to earn a living. 

She joined GDMPC in the year 2007, and now she has requested a loan of 4,000 PHP to purchase copra materials. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase copra materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy essential goods for her business.

loans.name: Maame Araba

texts.en:
Maame Araba is single and has two children. After successfully graduating from lower-level school, Maame Araba is now an established businesswoman. She sells cassava, plantains and provisions in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about five years. As the sole breadwinner in the family Maame Araba uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Maame Araba will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of cassava, plantains and provisions, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Maame Araba plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customers preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cassava, plantains and provisions.

loans.name: Cecilia Gakenia

texts.en:
Cecilia is a farmer in Ndunyu Njeru and has applied for her second loan from KADET Ltd. to enable her buy fertelizer and seeds after paying back her previous loan successfuly.

She hopes to put more emphasis on dairy farming since it is more profitable.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Adjoa is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling soft drinks in Wisdom Mpeasem (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 15 years. Adjoa is married and has six children. Her husband is currently unemployed. As the sole breadwinner in the family, the proceeds from her business normally go towards covering the entire family’s general expenses. 

Adjoa  wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of soft drinks. In the long term, Adjoa  plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demand.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia works hard to support her family. Rosalia is married and has a business buying and selling ready-to-wear in the Philippines.

Rosalia requested a PHP 19,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to purchase additional stocks of ready-to-wear to sell.

Rosalia has been in this business for eight years now.

Rosalia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of ready-to-wear to sell.

loans.name: Juan Eugenio

texts.es:
Juan Eugenio de 48 años de edad, se dedica a la comercialización de carne de res y cerdo en un local asignado por la alcaldía de su municipio. Asegura que desde los ochos aprendió la actividad gracias a su padre quien toda su vida laboró en el mismo oficio. A la edad de 20 años montó su propio negocio y con el transcurrir del tiempo ha logrado posicionarlo.
Con su trabajo ha sacado adelante a sus dos hijos, brindándoles educación de calidad.
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de  carne res y cerdo, debido a que las ventas han aumentado por el mes de las madres y desea poder garantizarles a sus clientes un buen servicio.
